Detailed Description

cvmx_sdl::_ul_axc_map_lut#

These registers program the AxC mapping for the upload channels of SDL.

Each SDL basic frame (or chip) contains 64 time slots, and each of these 16 regsiters controls which AxC is mapped to each time slot.

_ SDL(0..2)_UL_AXC_LUT(0) controls time slots [TS3, TS2, TS1, TS0] with fields 3-0 respectively.

_ SDL(0..2)_UL_AXC_LUT(1) controls time slots [TS7, TS6, TS5, TS4] with fields 3-0 respectively,

_ etc.

Note that each AxC must be mapped to either 2, 4, or 8 time slots, depending on whether the bandwidth is 5 MHz, 10 MHz, or 20 MHz, respectively.

Consecutive time samples for a given antenna should be assigned to strided time slots as follows: 5 MHz: TS x and TS x+32. 10 MHz: TS x, TS x+16, TS x+32, and TS x+48. 20 MHz: TS x, TS x+8, TS x+16, TS x+24, TS x+32, TS x+40, TS x+48, and TS x+56.
